member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_FRAME_TYPE_H264
member.summary: Specifies the type of an H.264 video frame.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_FRAME_TYPE_H264.D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_FRAME_TYPE_H264_P_FRAME
member.summary: P-Frame. Allows references to past frames.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_FRAME_TYPE_H264.D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_FRAME_TYPE_H264_B_FRAME
member.summary: B-Frame. Allows references to both past and future (in display order) frames.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_FRAME_TYPE_H264.D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_FRAME_TYPE_H264_IDR_FRAME
member.summary: Instantaneous decode refresh frame. Special type of I-frame where no frame after it can reference any frame before it.
